text: Della Reese (July 6, 1931 - November 19, 2017) was an American singer, (television) actress, and Christian minister. She started acting in the 1950s. She was best known for performing as Tess in the CBS drama Touched by an Angel (which began September 1994 and ended in 2003). She was born in Detroit, Michigan. Reese died of complications from diabetes on November 19, 2017 in Encino, California at the age of 86. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1931 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Actors from Detroit Category:African-American movie actors Category:African-American singers Category:African-American stage actors Category:African-American television actors Category:American gospel musicians Category:American jazz musicians Category:American pop singers Category:American Protestants Category:American R&B; singers Category:American Christian clergy Category:American jazz singers Category:Singers from Detroit
title: Della Reese
